channel.title: Project Ferrari!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/simscapehome/Ferrari%20Enzo%20logo.png[/img] Hello all! I have not been here in a long time... but I'de like to announce the launch of my newest project... Project Ferrari! We need your support! I'm glad to say that its coming from scratch (Winter Loves Source), so nothing is leached. But this is the begining of a great new Source and server, witch uses Silabsoft's Client, so it has skill capes the new items from Silabsoft, and is kept up to date. On making this me and my team are going to accomplish alot of things, we want most of everything working, while starting from a source that has absolutly nothing working, and make it as fun as runescape, but better. with all working skills, customized areas, and a good economy! so not everyone has all level 99, and full dragon, you got to work for it. and by the way, there will be NO COMMANDS, but some for teleporting, only if we cant get the portal chanber in.
[shadow=red,left][i][u]What have we got so far?[/u][/i][/shadow] - Skill capes (creds go to Silabsoft) - new items (creds go to Silabsfot) - autospawn
[i][u]What have we not go so far?[/u][/i] - portal chanber - skills (all will be working by the end of the project) - dueling - castle wars - training ares - pk dungeon - mage arena - gnome gliders - working boats - shops - special events - quests - menus - portals - global objects - website - forums (half way done...) - starting point (please suggest one if you have an idea) - full lumbrige - full verrock - full falador - full camelot - full jad - npc dialogs And more to come! Don't think im lazy, i just started this project yesterday....
[i][u]The staff[/u][/i] [i][u]Server Coders[/u][/i] 1. Rune Unlimited 2. 3. 4. [i][u]Site coders[/u][/i] 1. Rune Unlimited 2. 3. 4. [i][u]Graphics team[/u][/i] 1. Byebye213 2. 3. 4.
(the only reson why i have a team is, some poepl my not like were i put things on the server or how i word thins, so its good to ahve more than one person for stuff like this, so there is more possibillities, ad to get help when i need it.)
[i][u]NOTE:[/u][/i] All the staff will comunicate trought Yahoo! Instant Messanger,if your thinging about signing up for the team, you MUST have a yahoo! account With messanger status.
[i][u]Would you want to sign up to be a team member?[/u][/i] If you want to sign up to be a team member, fill out these forms and post them here.
[i][u]What do you want to sign up for? -[/u][/i] [i][u]In a scail on 1-10 what do you rate your self in that subject? -[/u][/i] [i][u]Additional information -[/u][/i] (by filling these out and getting accepted, you agree that you will be a part of Project Ferrari's Team, and will be reliable when the team will need you.)
Well, thanks for looking! If you want to show your soport to Project Ferrari, put this in your signature! "I support Project Ferrari!"
Thanks.[flash=200,200][/flash]

item.title: Project Ferrari!
item.dc:creator: @rune_unlimited rune unlimited
item.description:
@rune_unlimited wrote:


Hello all! I have not been here in a long time… but I’de like to announce the launch of my newest project… Project Ferrari! We need your support! I’m glad to say that its coming from scratch (Winter Loves Source), so nothing is leached. But this is the begining of a great new Source and server, witch uses Silabsoft’s Client, so it has skill capes the new items from Silabsoft, and is kept up to date. On making this me and my team are going to accomplish alot of things, we want most of everything working, while starting from a source that has absolutly nothing working, and make it as fun as runescape, but better. with all working skills, customized areas, and a good economy! so not everyone has all level 99, and full dragon, you got to work for it. and by the way, there will be NO COMMANDS, but some for teleporting, only if we cant get the portal chanber in.

[shadow=red,left]What have we got so far?[/shadow]

  • Skill capes (creds go to Silabsoft)
  • new items (creds go to Silabsfot)
  • autospawn

What have we not go so far?

  • portal chanber
  • skills (all will be working by the end of the project)
  • dueling
  • castle wars
  • training ares
  • pk dungeon
  • mage arena
  • gnome gliders
  • working boats
  • shops
  • special events
  • quests
  • menus
  • portals
  • global objects
  • website
  • forums (half way done…)
  • starting point (please suggest one if you have an idea)
  • full lumbrige
  • full verrock
  • full falador
  • full camelot
  • full jad
  • npc dialogs
    And more to come!
    Don’t think im lazy, i just started this project yesterday…

The staff
Server Coders

  1. Rune Unlimited

Site coders

  1. Rune Unlimited

Graphics team

  1. Byebye213

(the only reson why i have a team is, some poepl my not like were i put things on the server or how i word thins, so its good to ahve more than one person for stuff like this, so there is more possibillities, ad to get help when i need it.)

NOTE:
All the staff will comunicate trought Yahoo! Instant Messanger,if your thinging about signing up for the team, you MUST have a yahoo! account With messanger status.

Would you want to sign up to be a team member?
If you want to sign up to be a team member, fill out these forms and post them here.

What do you want to sign up for? -
In a scail on 1-10 what do you rate your self in that subject? -
Additional information -
(by filling these out and getting accepted, you agree that you will be a part of Project Ferrari’s Team, and will be reliable when the team will need you.)

Well, thanks for looking! If you want to show your soport to Project Ferrari, put this in your signature!
“I support Project Ferrari!”

Thanks.[flash=200,200][/flash]
